node.excerpt: The Title: Marketing Director The Job: So Much More Than That Shoolu.com is a fast growing online Shoe Retailer. They carry name brands like New Balance, Adidas, Earth, Dansko, FRYE, UGG & more. My job as the Marketing director was based around any…

BigCommerce has their Stencil Framework to build themes for their platform. I've extensively customized just about everything I can on Shoolu's Stencil Theme, but one massive thing is missing: You can't query specific products to display I'm sure…

quotes.quote: Jack's attention to detail and thorough communication always made us feel at ease. He has worked with us for about year developing our website and has been nothing short of patient and understanding. He comes HIGHLY recommended from National Roofing.
quotes.title: Marketing & Estimating Administrator @ National Roofing

quotes.quote: Jack saved my Shopify site from a very stupid SEO issue that would have killed all of my rankings. Highly recommended, very trustworthy dev. Truly a master of some trades.
quotes.title: Rank Theory

quotes.quote: big shout to @JackHarner for the recent work on one of my sites. Am immediately hiring him again for more work. Really good dude and developer for Shopify, eCommerce, and other website solutions.
quotes.title: Owner @ High Key Geek

quotes.quote: Jack is a workhorse. He's talented, reliable, and his code is clean. It's a pleasure to work together, and I would recommend him to anyone.

quotes.quote: With a knack for effective problem-solving, Jack has soundly proven himself as a trusted, reliable web development partner.
